remarks: Alternate definition of well-ordering.  Definition 6.24(2) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 30.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 12-Aug-2011.)
statement:
dfwe2 $p |- ( R We A <-> ( R Fr A /\ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x R y \/ x = y \/ y R x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d R x y $.
